About Me


    I'm Francesca. (she/her)


    I'm a UC Irvine student majoring in Game Design & Interactive Media! As of March 2024, I'm also a Design officer at UCI's Video Game Development Club. I'm a big fan of roguelikes and I derive a lot of my inspiration from them.

    I am

    a game designer


    who

    makes games
